segments.source_content: This theme provides a `@theme/SearchBar` component that integrates with Algolia DocSearch easily. Combined with `@docusaurus/theme-classic`, it provides a very easy search integration. You can read more on [search](../../search.mdx) documentation.

translations.zh-hant: 此主題提供了一個與 Algolia DocSearch 輕鬆整合的 `@theme/SearchBar` 組件。與 `@docusaurus/theme-classic` 結合使用時，可實現極簡的搜尋功能整合。更多資訊請參閱[搜尋功能](../../search.mdx)文件。

segments.source_content: This theme also adds search page available at `/search` (as swizzlable `SearchPage` component) path with OpenSearch support. You can change this default path via `themeConfig.algolia.searchPagePath`. Use `false` to disable search page.

translations.zh-hant: 本主題還新增了位於 `/search` 路徑的搜尋頁面（可作為可替換的 `SearchPage` 組件），並支援 OpenSearch。您可透過 `themeConfig.algolia.searchPagePath` 變更預設路徑，設定為 `false` 則會停用搜尋頁面。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

If you have installed `@docusaurus/preset-classic`, you don't need to install it as a dependency.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

若已安裝 `@docusaurus/preset-classic`，則無需將其作為依賴項另行安裝。

:::
